version.description: The version of the OpenAPI document (which is distinct from the OpenAPI Specification version or the API implementation version).

contact.description: Contact information for the exposed API.

license.description: The license information for the exposed API.

x-people.description: Different people in the company and their capabilities and communication channels

x-links.description: Important links needed for agents to make using the API easier.

token_url.description: URL for a post request for code exchange for access token (Oauth2)

revoke_url.description: Endpoint to revoke the OAuth2 token

authorization_url.description: URL Leading to a page to authorize/login. May contain {slug} that needs to be replaced with the clients slug. Please note this can also be a regular login page url in case the provider doesn't use oauth2.

billingUrl.description: Page from where logged-in user can make purchases, cancel subscription, etc.

usageUrl.description: URL of a page where the user can see their usage and its cost.

integrationsDocsUrl.description: Url to info about creating integration or authorization with the provider

apiManagementUrl.description: Url of the page where the user can find the required information for authorizing on the API. Usually this is a page where the user can create and see their API tokens.

credit.description: How much credit do you get for this. Credit matches the credit spent with 'priceCredit' extension for operations

persistence.description: How long will you retain the credit you receive?

interval.description:
If the plan is a subscription based plan, fill in the interval on which every time the price is paid, and credit is given. 

If there is a pay-as-you-go price, fill in the minimum purchase size for each step. It will be assumed the price to credit ratio is linear.

rateLimit.description: Plan-based RateLimit info that overwrites the general rateLimit.

x-rateLimit.description: Global ratelimit info. Can be overwritten either by plans or by operations.

x-alternatives.description: Link to other openapis that could be good alternatives.

x-logo.description: Logo metadata. Standard taken from https://apis.guru

RateLimit.description: Ratelimiting extension by ActionSchema. Can be applied globally, per plan, per tag, or per operation
